content: this pattern is written in standard american terms and rated easy the pattern has been tested and every effort has been made to ensure its accuracy ⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯ questions i m always happy to assist with pattern-related questions just send me a message copyright & usage pattern and images are property of simply made by erin this pattern is for personal use only please don t redistribute sell or share the file or images feel free to sell your finished items just kindly credit me as the designer you may copy and paste the following information to your product pattern designed by simply made by erin www simplymadebyerin com www instagram com/simplymadebyerin www youtube com/simplymadebyerin ⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯ gpsr compliance notice eu buyers this is a digital pdf crochet pattern - no physical item will be shipped file format pdf digital download designer simply made by erin usa business address po box 75 indian springs nv 89018 usa email erin@simplymadebyerin com compliance responsible person eu ciara doyle 6 killallon close c15 y5f9 ireland email ciara@thefairythorn ie phone +353 46 940 8002 this product has been reviewed for foreseeable safety risks in accordance with the eu general product safety regulation gpsr safety information suitable for adult use only not intended as a toy requires basic crochet knowledge and may involve the use of sharp tools e g scissors hooks needles - handle responsibly and keep out of reach of children follow ergonomic practices during extended crochet sessions to help prevent strain or injury ensure your device can open pdf files before purchase
